last_posted.tweet: SPY idea: buy 660C expiring 2025-09-26. SPY sits around 657 today, near-the-money. Limited risk to premium; upside if rate-cut optimism lifts markets and SPY closes above 660 at expiry. Break-even near 660 plus premium.
last_posted.summary:
SPY trades near 657, with markets pricing in a late-September rate cut. A near-the-money 660 call expiring Sept 26 offers defined risk and potential upside if the rate rhetoric stays constructive.

Trade setup targets a breakout above 660 with a relatively short time horizon; be mindful of time decay and headline risk from Fed comments.
